bullet_text.last_approved_text:
[[b]]NIGHT BATTLES[[/b]]

Attacking an army at night will diminish their morale and cause fatigue, unless they too are able to fight night battles.

Armies without this ability will be unable to reinforce nearby night battles.

unit_attributes.bullet_text:
[[b]]NIGHT BATTLES[[/b]]

Attacking an army at night will diminish their morale and cause fatigue, unless they too are able to fight night battles.

Armies without this ability will be unable to reinforce nearby night battles.
